titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes 1977.080
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:41:22 +0000.

did.unittitle: Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Fire Dept. Board of Trustees

did.abstract: The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes span the period 1848 to 1854 and are housed in a single hardbound volume. The minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting. Topics discussed at the meetings most often included financial transactions and ammendments to the constitution and bylaws of the board.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition uknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes, 1977.080, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
